8E970FD4.description: Usopp manages to anger the brat daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father and finds his own life at stake. When Daddy discovers that Usopp is the son of Red Hair Pirate Yasopp, the only man to beat him, he offers him a risky way out.
8E970FD4.title: Parallels

8FDCC832.description: If the Straw Hats have any chance of saving Nami, they must carry her up a mountain to see the sole doctor of a nameless, winter island. While Sanji and Luffy fight off the wilderness, a despicable king makes an unwanted return.
8FDCC832.title: Adventure in a Nameless Country

90015E67.description: Fresh off the adventure at Fishman Island, the Sunny is caught in a massive whirlpool and dragged off course. A desperate cry for help leads the Straw Hats to Punk Hazard, an island engulfed in flames and inhabited by a mythic beast.
90015E67.title: Punk Hazard

90034ECC.description: Luffy enters the tournament at Corrida Colosseum to compete for Ace's fruit, but with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal!
90034ECC.title: The Colosseum of Many New Faces and Maynard the Pursuer!

902076E8.description: Enter Chopper: a talking, transforming blue-nosed reindeer who was trained by Dr. Kureha in medicine. The Straw Hats immediately see the positives and want him on their crew, but Chopper must first deal with the monstrous pain in his heart.
902076E8.title: Enter: Tony Tony Chopper

90C45C25.description: With a little help from their new friends—and a giant octopus—the Straw Hats bid farewell to Skypiea and begin their descent back to the Blue Sea. Then as night falls, a certain Warlord makes an appearance at Jaya...
90C45C25.title: Finale

9101CF0E.description: The keepers of Shift Station, Kokoro and her granddaughter Chimney, point the Straw Hats in the direction of the metropolitan Water Seven. The nearby city is regarded as the best place to find a decent shipwright for the Going Merry.
9101CF0E.title: The City of Water, Water Seven

919A1140.description: Ashura Doji, a.k.a Shutenmaru, is one of the allies Kin’emon wants to search for, and he leads a raid on Okobore Town to steal the food that Luffy brought. This unrest prompts the drunken Kaido to fly above Okobore Town in his dragon form.
919A1140.title: Shutenmaru

91BE23B7.description: Ashura Doji, a.k.a Shutenmaru, is one of the allies Kin’emon wants to search for, and he leads a raid on Okobore Town to steal the food that Luffy brought. This unrest prompts the drunken Kaido to fly above Okobore Town in his dragon form.
91BE23B7.title: Shutenmaru

91EEA92E.description: Though Ace and Whitebeard have been killed, the Marines seek to wipe out every last pirate, even as they retreat. In the confusion, Akainu sets his eyes on the unconscious Luffy. Meanwhile, Blackbeard reveals his true scheme and a terrifying new power!
91EEA92E.title: A Gift to a New Era

92956F40.description: Fifty warships, 100,000 Marines, the Seven Warlords, and three admirals: Akainu, Aokiji, and Kizaru. The stage is set, and, as a battle with Whitebeard looms, Fleet Admiral Sengoku reveals a shocking truth about Ace.
92956F40.title: Marine Headquarters

93376225.description: The wounded Zoro wakes up to find out the shocking identity of the woman he saved and is told the unbelievable tale of twenty years earlier. Meanwhile, Luffy’s “training” is not getting anywhere, but a surprising person gives him his first lesson.
93376225.title: A Woman's Secret

94E2099D.description: Neptune’s army aids the Straw Hats against the New Fishman Pirates, finally accepting the crew as allies. As the fight continues, Fukaboshi’s transponder snail reveals the bone chilling truth behind Hody's motivations.
94E2099D.title: Phantom

94E3481F.description: Sanji challenges his entire family, but they have effectively ensured he follows their wedding scheme. The truth of Germa's power and Vinsmoke Judge’s dark history is also revealed. Meanwhile, Nami has recruited the homies and challenges Cracker!
94E3481F.title: The Iron Mask

94F78CF3.description: Chopper’s group is off to rescue Luffy from the Prisoner Mining Camp, but the Straw Hat captain is in a bit of a bind. While Luffy tries to save old man Hyo from execution, Queen the Plague comes to visit the prison.
94F78CF3.title: Hyogoro the Flower

952F5BEB.description: Robin's mother Olvia was on the run from the World Government, and tragedy was unavoidable from the moment Professor Clover and his colleagues decided to continue their research. No one on Ohara was safe.
952F5BEB.title: Ohara vs. The World Government

9599889C.description: Luffy’s newest move leaves him incapacitated and at the mercy of the sea while Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp desperately fight off Arlong’s top officers.
9599889C.title: Chivalry vs. Fishman Karate

964FB36B.description: Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, and Tashigi’s men make the ultimate sacrifice! Luffy races toward Caesar to deliver on his promise to beat and capture him, and Chopper does all he can to keep the children from consuming more candy.
964FB36B.title: G-5's Sacrifice and the Betrayal of the Vice Admiral!

9677C63E.description: Luffy, in disguise, crosses paths with the fake Luffy, and the imposter finds himself on the receiving end of a mysterious power. Meanwhile, Sentomaru and the Marines have yet again amassed a team of Pacifistas.
9677C63E.title: Island of New Beginnings

9794072D.description: Finally convinced to join the Straw Hat Pirates, Chopper announces his intentions to Dr. Kureha. While she doesn’t receive the news well at first, she decides to give the Straw Hats a fond parting gift while they exit the island.
9794072D.title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms

97E4F5E3.description: Eustass "Captain" Kid sails in, guns blazing against Elbaph while Shanks of the Red Hair Pirates defends his crew and friends... without an ounce of mercy.
97E4F5E3.title: The Emperor's Crew, The Red Hair Pirates

9863ADF4.description: The lost ruins of Shandora are revealed in a spectacle of lightning, and the remaining survivors of Enel's twisted game begin their showdown with the self-styled deity. As the group faces him, "God" reveals his ultimate goal...
9863ADF4.title: Quintet

98B5E26D.description: Oden transformed Kuri and was made Daimyo over it. He also met a kappa fishman and two minks, who soon became his followers. Kin’emon and the other vassals took Yasuie's strong words to heart and began transforming themselves for their lord.
98B5E26D.title: Daimyo and Retainers

99260C5A.description: Enel wipes out several fighters regardless of their allegiance. An hour remains until God's deadline, and only twenty-four survivors remain. Meanwhile, after a deadly struggle with the rotund Yama, Robin makes the discovery of a lifetime.
99260C5A.title: Pirate Robin vs. Commander Yama

9974A092.description: As the Straw Hat Pirates reunite on the Sabaody Archipelago, the various members of the island are drawn together like pieces of a puzzle, their love of certain members of the crew driving their actions and emotions.
9974A092.manga_chapters: One Piece Novel: Straw Hat Stories
9974A092.title: One Piece Fan Letter

99A61805.description: Filled with both excitement and trepidation, the crew finally sets sail for the New World. After bidding their fond farewells, the Straw Hats leave with a new log pose in hand. Overcoming trials and tragedies, Luffy's dream is on course once again!
99A61805.title: The Hero's Hat

9B126B00.description: Mont Blanc Noland's tale ends in tragedy and misunderstanding. In the present, Enel strikes Angel Island with a devastating lightning bolt, and Luffy refuses to halt his climb up the beanstalk until he rings the golden bell!
9B126B00.title: Raigō

9C3360D6.description: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; however, the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and he reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora’s true intention.
9C3360D6.title: The Operation Fruit

9CE5B9DD.description: Smoker attacks the estranged Vice Admiral Vergo for assaulting his men, and in the trash heap, Luffy meets something strange. Meanwhile, Caesar’s bloated words to his men about the island’s history do not match what occurred.
9CE5B9DD.title: Vice Admiral vs. Vice Admiral and the Truth Behind Punk Hazard's Destruction!

9D785326.description: Only 80 remain in the Upper Yard survival game. Zoro finds himself face-to-face with the Shandian Braham, Luffy takes on Wyper and his burning bazooka, and Nami’s group on the Merry has the deadliest encounter of all!
9D785326.title: Pirate Luffy vs. Berserker Wyper

9DEAD0F3.description: Ace, Sabo, and Luffy made a promise to one another over cups of sake that would shape their futures. Yet while the brothers' adventures continue, Sabo's unfortunate past catches up with him. Meanwhile, a horrific plot unfolds.
9DEAD0F3.title: Oath of Brotherhood

9E0A91E9.description: The mermaids of Fishman Island give the Straw Hats a warm welcome, but Sanji is struck with a sudden medical emergency! Luffy and co. take their anemic friend to the Mermaid Cafe to rest, where they are introduced to its soothsaying owner.
9E0A91E9.title: Arrival at Coral Hill! The Nosebleed and the Devastating Prediction!

9F63AF78.description: Tonoyasu has been strung up and awaits his inevitable execution while all of Wano is shocked to find out who he really is. The citizens cry out in outrage, and the doomed man raises his voice in a final act of rebellion against Shogun Orochi.
9F63AF78.title: Shimotsuki Yasuie, the Daimyo of Hakumai

9FA61F60.description: In the Flower Capital, a member of the Beast Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in search of Sanji. The Straw Hat’s cook faces Kaido’s headliner while using Germa’s device for the first time to hide his identity.
9FA61F60.title: Soba Mask

9FC7EE52.description: Luffy's band reaches the city of Rainbase but encounter Smoker and Tashigi. As they defend themselves against both the Marines and Baroque Works' millions, Luffy's party storms Crocodile's Rain Dinners Casino.
9FC7EE52.title: Rainbase, the City of Dreams

A08EC3B9.description: Kin’emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden brought peace to Kuri and became its daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Orochi. When Kin’emon ran to save Oden’s wife, she revealed a shocking truth.
A08EC3B9.title: I Love Oden

A1039182.description: In a surprising twist, Gin finishes Pearl off himself, claiming Sanji as his own target. Though still wounded, Sanji rises to the challenge and faces off with Gin. As the battle draws to a close, Don Krieg unleashes a deadly toxin into the air.
A1039182.title: MH5

A1DFB514.description: The Shandians’ attack on Upper Yard commences! At the Sacrificial Altar, the crew is finally reunited, and everyone recounts what has happened. Chopper looks after the injured Gan Fall, and the pirates devise a plan to steal the gold on the island.
A1DFB514.title: Vearth

A3939979.description: Wielding Napoleon and backed by Zeus and Prometheus, Big Mom wreaks havoc on the Sunny. As the Straw Hats try to kick out the Emperor, their ship catches fire! But then, Jinbe steps up to the plate to take a swing.
A3939979.title: Unknown Mama

A42DEAED.description: After Vegapunk shares his dream with Luffy's group, he asks the Straw Hat captain for a big favor. Meanwhile, CP0 ignores their lack of invitation to Egghead and get around the island defenses to make landfall.
A42DEAED.title: Punk Records

A465972A.description: While Alvida and her pirates plunder a cruise ship, they come across a barrel containing a strange boy named Monkey D. Luffy. The timid Koby befriends Luffy, and they share their grand dreams with each other.
A465972A.title: They Call Him "Straw Hat" Luffy

A4F76B13.description: The Straw Hats finally meet the daytime ruler of this strange land. They learn more about the battle that took place here and discover the mysterious system by which the island is ruled.
A4F76B13.title: Duke Inuarashi and Master Nekomamushi

A50167E6.description: Nami takes the waver out for a test ride and discovers the forbidden Upper Yard. Meanwhile, law enforcement arrives and rudely harasses the rest of the gang.
A50167E6.title: Divine Reckoning

A5145C90.description: Wapol and his comrades reach the mountaintop castle to wrest control of it back from Dr. Kureha and Chopper. Luffy, Sanji, and Chopper go head-to-head against his Munch-Munch powers, vowing to keep Wapol and his men from bringing down Hiriluk's flag.
A5145C90.title: Unbreakable

A57211D1.description: Luffy springs into action against Arlong, and their intense struggle commences! Luffy becomes enraged when he discovers how exactly Arlong had been using Nami, and he comes to a quick decision on how to finally free her of her shackles.
A57211D1.title: Happiness

A594704B.description: Captain Kuro makes his appearance, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy incapacitated, and Usopp and Nami too weak to make a stand, the situation is desperate. However, Kaya herself arrives, intent on bargaining with Kuro.
A594704B.title: The Silent Man

A5F0A507.description: Impressed by Luffy’s efforts to protect the secret of the snake sisters, Hancock reveals the story behind the familiar mark on their backs. Their childhood was tragic, suffered at the hands of a corrupt group that Luffy knows all too well.
A5F0A507.title: Hancock's Confession

A65C20C2.description: Only three officers in all the Marines hold the position of admiral, literal powerhouses of the World Government. The icy Aokiji, one such admiral, catches up with the Straw Hats, but Luffy is not the one he is after.
A65C20C2.title: Marine HQ Admiral Aokiji

A6CD3EBB.description: As the Straw Hats and their allies approach Enies Lobby on Rocketman, they hatch a plan to save Robin before she passes through the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Spandam holds a meeting with CP9 where they await Lucci's return in the Tower of Justice.
A6CD3EBB.title: The Superhumans of Enies Lobby

A6D860C5.description: Luffy, Usopp, and Karoo launch headlong into rescuing their friends, but Miss Golden Week runs a colorful interference. Mr. 3 is forced to take matters into his own conniving hands, and Usopp brainstorms how he will finally free his friends.
A6D860C5.title: Luffy vs. Mr. 3

A6DDEC2C.description: With Nami joining as Luffy's navigator (though not as an actual member of the crew), they arrive at Syrup Village in search of a proper ship. There they meet a man claiming to be a pirate captain who also seems to have ties to Red-Haired Shanks.
A6DDEC2C.title: Captain Usopp

A84B5499.description: Faced with the might of the admirals, even Whitebeard's commanders falter. Refusing to relent, Luffy begs Ivankov for a final chance at victory. Amid a bevy of Marines, an old friend of Luffy’s appears for a much too premature reunion.
A84B5499.title: The White Monster

A8E42FE1.description: Luffy fights through more obstacles in search of Sanji, and Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding. While Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under their control, Mont d'Or has his doubts.
A8E42FE1.title: Not Here

A905C964.description: Thanks to Sanji's brave actions, the Straw Hats made their escape, and Captain Smoker graciously looks the other way as they flee. However, as they set out toward Alubarna, Crocodile waylays Luffy, and the two begin a vicious duel.
A905C964.title: Rush!!

A95DE47B.description: The battle in Block B hits a crescendo as the Fighting King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Kingdom of Prodence faction unravels!
A95DE47B.title: B Block on Fire! Outlandish Competitors and King Punch!

A9784E2B.description: The Straw Hats sans Luffy are faced with the insurmountable task of taking out Oars. To knock him down, Franky decides they will need to use his newly developed tactic. But as they begin "docking" onto one another, a slight problem arises.
A9784E2B.title: Clash! The Titanic Battle Against Zombie 900!

A9C9701B.description: Refreshed and refueled, Franky turns the tide in his battle with Fukuro. Meanwhile, Zoro and Sogeking must find a way to compensate for their self-imposed handicap, and Chopper unfortunately comes face-to-face with Kumadori.
A9C9701B.title: Vitality Response

AB231A9E.description: Rocketman blasts out of Water Seven and connects with the sea tracks, and old foes become allies for the coming struggle. Aqua Laguna swells, and it's up to Luffy and Zoro to combine their might and create safe passage for all aboard.
AB231A9E.title: Sogeking

ABB0AC56.description: Nami and Luffy discuss a rendezvous point while the others break the mirrors on the Sunny. Little do they know their plan is overheard, and Luffy’s grueling battle against Katakuri—haki vs. haki, rubber vs. mochi—intensifies.
ABB0AC56.title: Wave Room

ACBE88D6.description: Franky and Luffy's groups are split up, but each encounter a person claiming to be Dr. Vegapunk. On the island, Luffy and co. find convenient food and futuristic clothing, but when a pacifista shows up, Bonney reveals her shocking relationship with Kuma.
ACBE88D6.title: Adventure in the Land of Science

ACC7852E.description: Gladius' exploding spheres send Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling directly into Luffy and co.’s battle with some creepy dolls. Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, and Sabo tastes Fujitora's full might!
ACC7852E.title: Trump Card

ACD6AA5F.description: When a Marine officer under Arlong's pay confiscates all the money Nami accumulated over the years, it becomes clear where Arlong stands on his promise.
ACD6AA5F.title: Live

ACF1C889.description: Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law. While Vice Admiral Smoker determines his next move, an exceptionally large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard’s mysterious transformation!
ACF1C889.title: CC

AD09145D.description: As they depart the Baratie in pursuit of Nami and the Going Merry, Yosaku warns Luffy and Sanji about the vicious Arlong and his fishman underlings. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro make landfall where Nami docked the Merry.
AD09145D.title: Arlong Park

AD2D4BCD.description: Moria’s defeat returns the shadows of all his victims. However, one Warlord remains on the island, and he has orders to terminate the Straw Hats and everyone else in the area. A lone Zoro faces Kuma in vain and is presented with a deadly choice.
AD2D4BCD.title: The Power That Can Deflect Anything?! Zoro Fights Prepared to Die!

AD550761.description: Law's plan to infiltrate Caesar’s facility hits a snag when an unexpected guest complicates things. Meanwhile, Chopper investigates the Master’s lab, and the mysterious samurai shows what he can do with a full body!
AD550761.title: My Name Is Kin'emon!!

AD8C9C16.description: Back in Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki seemed to fall critically ill and named Orochi proxy Shogun. Meanwhile, Whitebeard's crew made landfall where the Roger Pirates were fighting against the Marines on the other side of the island.
AD8C9C16.title: Roger and Whitebeard

AE6ABE84.description: Wano’s top courtesan—the oiran Komurasaki—is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. While everyone is fascinated by the oiran, some seeking vengeance get in her way.
AE6ABE84.title: Oiran Komurasaki Arrives

AF5B5194.description: Sanji coolly fights his way through the sea train and locates Usopp and Franky. Back in Water Seven, Kokoro sees how determined Luffy is to save Robin, so she and Iceburg lend the Straw Hat crew an unexpected helping hand.
AF5B5194.title: Aqua Laguna

B1D913B9.description: Chopper counters the combined Chessmarimo with an item that expands his zoan fruit abilities. Wapol slips away into his old castle, but Luffy runs after him to force a final showdown.
B1D913B9.title: The Skies of Drum

B4592974.description: The old fishman Tom was framed by CP5 for the crime of attacking the Marines with Franky's battleships. As the World Government hauled Tom off to Enies Lobby, Franky received a lasting reminder to take pride in the ships he builds.
B4592974.title: Mr. Tom

B46EDD50.description: With nowhere to run, Luffy's desperation to save Ace forces him to make a very grim sacrifice against his venomous adversary. Down in the frozen depths of Level 5, Bon Kurei rushes to his friend's aid, betting on a distant hope.
B46EDD50.title: Friend

B4950266.description: After a one-sided brawl with Bellamy, the Straw Hats meet a black-haired pirate outside the bar who reaffirms their dreams and insists the sky island is real. As they depart for the other side of Jaya, another salvager of the Saruyama Alliance appears.
B4950266.title: People's Dreams

B51C53E9.description: Otama is kidnapped by Kaido’s gifters and taken to a flourishing settlement called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking headliner was expecting her. Luffy, Zoro, and the samurai Okiku rush to her rescue.
B51C53E9.title: Okobore Town

B5A40AD2.description: Luffy and Crocodile enter the third phase of their duel, and, without water at his disposal, Luffy is forced to improvise. Back on the surface, Vivi uses her knowledge of the city to finally pinpoint the location of the bomb's cannoneer.
B5A40AD2.title: Croc-ish

B5D2AC50.description: Despite his internal injuries and Luffy's warnings, the prideful giant Dorry insists on continuing his duel with Brogy. Meanwhile, the Baroque Works officer agents begin to make their move on the island with the Straw Hats as their next targets.
B5D2AC50.title: Foul Play

B692FD08.description: As they continue to traverse the Grand Line, the Straw Hats pass a ship with no sails, no Jolly Roger, and no captain. After an encounter with giant sea monkeys, they come upon an island where everything is much longer than usual.
B692FD08.title: Adventure on a Long Island

B6BD1A60.description: Shirahoshi flees into the open sea, hoping to draw the Noah away from Fishman Island. Luffy follows her, but he must contend with Hody Jones along the way. Luckily, the appearance of a new ally gives Luffy a chance to protect Shirahoshi.
B6BD1A60.title: I'll Protect Everything

B9537A27.description: While Cross Guild grows into a serious concern for the Marines, Buggy makes an impassioned speech to spur his crew into a zealous fervor. Additionally, Sabo returns to his comrades and begins his report on the events that happened at the Reverie.
B9537A27.title: Let's Go and Take It!!

BAFD9522.description: Luffy's group finally catches up to Robin, but they are greeted by disappointment—Robin opts to stay with CP9 and leave the Straw Hats. As Robin turns away from Luffy, the members of CP9 confronts the pirates.
BAFD9522.title: Six Powers

BAFFE801.description: As Oden began his voyage, he was in awe of all the things that he had never seen before, and for the first time in his life, he became a wanted person and made the headlines, catching the eye of a high-profile figure.
BAFFE801.title: Oden's Adventure

BB1D093C.description: In Arabasta, the hero Crocodile appears and puts a decisive end to a pillaging band of pirates. Meanwhile, Mr. 2 Bon Kurei pays a visit to the newly arrived Straw Hats. When he puts his abilities on display, Vivi notices something shocking.
BB1D093C.title: Sir Crocodile, the Pirate

BCF2E97B.description: The final round of the Davy Back Fight rages on, and atop the deck of Foxy's ship, the epic battle nears its climax. During the fight, Luffy makes a surprise discovery about Foxy's powers that he keeps strategically hidden.
BCF2E97B.title: K.O.

BD7169C3.description: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji leave the relative safety of the Sunny to face the Kraken in its own territory. Putting their powerful new skills to work, they survive the encounter but are swept away by a downward current and become lost in the murky depths.
BD7169C3.title: Adventure in the Ocean Depths! 10 Kilometers Below the Surface!

BE72EB0E.description: With Operation SOP in its final stage, the Tontattas are devastated by Trebol’s furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander’s stunning true identity.
BE72EB0E.title: Captain

BF59EB14.description: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp are locked in a life-or-death struggle against the Priest Satori. It's all they can do to withstand the random attributes of Satori's strange spheres and to overcome the power of mantra, which can seemingly predict their movements.
BF59EB14.title: The Village Hidden in the Clouds

BF92DCAF.description: In the Prisoner Mining Camp, Luffy’s and Kid’s competition garners the wrong kind of attention. Meanwhile, Sanji’s soba becomes immensely popular, but gang members disturb his business and knock over a customer’s bowl.
BF92DCAF.title: Otoko the Kamuro

C060DA73.description: Luffy’s group has reached the island but are met with a shocking revelation. Unmoved by Nami’s apparent actions and her insistence that he leaves, Luffy stubbornly sticks around.
C060DA73.title: Sea Charts and Fishmen

C0B33E05.description: Lucci corners Luffy, weakened by his new ability’s aftereffects. Back on the bridge, Spandam makes an attempt on Robin's life, so Franky jumps into action. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang is about to drown in the flooded passageway.
C0B33E05.title: The Legend of the Mermaid

C0B845B2.description: While Koby desperately attempts to flee Beehive, Cross Guild's bounty entices the hundreds of pirates there to hunt him down. But before they can seal his fate and claim the prize, a familiar Marine warship descends from the sky!
C0B845B2.title: The Legendary Hero

C19CADF5.description: Blaming Sanji for his misfortunes, Duval swears vengeance on the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders attempt to sink the Sunny, but the ship is far from vulnerable. Finally, Sanji himself faces Duval in a bid to end things.
C19CADF5.title: Duval's Tragedy

C19D5680.description: The Straw Hats hold their own against the powerful officers from Hody’s crew. But their struggle will be in vain if Luffy cannot stop the Noah. Meanwhile, Hody becomes stronger than ever.
C19D5680.title: What Are You?

C21EC74A.description: With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! Among the cries of the Tontattas, Usopp has a difficult decision to make.
C21EC74A.title: Usoland the Liar

C23AC8D3.description: Nami, a street-smart girl who loves money and tangerines, makes Luffy's acquaintance. To save herself and steal a map to the Grand Line, she tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to the infamous pirate Buggy the Clown.
C23AC8D3.title: Enter: Nami

C2835057.description: Luffy is sentenced to execution by arena combat with Boa Hancock’s serpentine sisters. Luffy soon discovers that the two women have a mysterious ability that allows them to slither through all his attacks unharmed.
C2835057.title: The Arena

C29E5C35.description: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault. Meanwhile, Bartolomeo searches the colosseum for Luffy and discovers something strange about the medical center for the defeated.
C29E5C35.title: Law's New Strategy and the Colosseum's Underground Nightmare!

C2AAAAF7.description: While staying at Hogback's eerie mansion, Nami is assaulted by an invisible figure in the shower. It does not end there as Usopp battles haunted paintings with a handful of candles. Meanwhile, the rest of the Straw Hats finally make landfall.
C2AAAAF7.title: The Invisible Man and the Secret of the Mansion!

C2C37921.description: In the colosseum, Chinjao finally faces Luffy and reveals the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontattas' raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa’s living toys.
C2C37921.title: C Block's Blazing Battle and the Forgotten of Dressrosa!

C3825063.description: To Chopper’s surprise, the kind and sweet Olin—a.k.a. Emperor Big Mom—has proven her power to be just as devastating as ever. Olin’s hunger pangs just about reach their limit, and Luffy must act quickly before his mechanical collar executes him.
C3825063.title: Queen vs. Olin

C4106519.description: Spandam drags Robin along the Bridge of Hesitation and finally arrives at the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Zoro continues his clash with Kaku, and as things become more desperate, Zoro's rage begins to manifest as a dark aura.
C4106519.title: Zoro vs. Kaku

C51CB284.description: Despite his severe injuries, Karoo picks up Vivi to flee the attacks of Mr. 2, and they dash madly through the battlefield. And at the southeast gate: Chopper and Usopp vs. Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas!
C51CB284.title: Molehill Zone Four

C5FB1123.description: Luffy’s reputation grows as all eyes look toward the Straw Hats’ next move. Meanwhile, the royals of the world make their way to the Reverie, but their absence welcomes a raid by a vicious band of pirates on the Kingdom of Lulusia.
C5FB1123.title: The Fifth Emperor

C6120876.description: The pirates are fed up and ready to leave Skypiea, but Nami, Zoro, Robin, and Chopper are whisked away aboard the Merry. The remaining Straw Hat Pirates must face Enel’s challenge, so Conis shows them the way to Upper Yard.
C6120876.title: Ordeal

C65F13AA.description: His adopted son within reach, Whitebeard charges forth, undeterred by the strongest the Marines have to offer. With both sides swinging between victory and defeat, the battlefield plunges into chaos. Then Marco takes to the sky and soars to Ace’s side!
C65F13AA.title: Oris Plaza

C6E79353.description: Lilith takes the Sunny and its remaining crew to the laboratory in the clouds, where a new threat lurking within its corridors attacks unexpectedly. As the battle ensues, Vegapunk's satellites look on with excitement.
C6E79353.title: The Six Vegapunks

C89B4C1E.description: After Kaido attacks Oden's family in their castle, Toki uses her power one last time and makes a prophecy to the people of Wano. Twenty years later, the raid on Onigashima is imminent, but the sting of betrayal hits hardest on the eve of triumph!
C89B4C1E.title: The Kozuki Clan

C9362978.description: Viola, once a princess of the Dressrosan royal family, shows Luffy and the others a secret entrance into the palace. In the meantime, Admiral Fujitora reveals his audacious plans for the Seven Warlords of the Sea!
C9362978.title: Fujitora's Outlook

C99E7631.description: In the midst of the chaos on the Performance Floor, Chopper learns the secret behind Queen's latest plague. Meanwhile, Big Mom reaches the roof, Sanji hurries in the name of love, and Zoro watches as something falls from the hole in the ceiling.
C99E7631.title: Flame Clouds

CA3F14A8.description: The Straw Hats rave over new bounties, and Crocodile and Mihawk pay Buggy a visit. Elsewhere, Dragon and his revolutionaries are shocked when they read about Sabo in the news, and an old comrade returns, a shell of his former self.
CA3F14A8.title: New Emperors

CA5552FC.description: The Straw Hats, having used the Knock-Up Stream to fly into the sky, arrive on a white ocean above the clouds. While they marvel at the otherworldly sights, they are attacked by a powerful masked figure, and a mysterious flying knight comes to their aid.
CA5552FC.title: Heaven's Gate

CAA32C42.description: Using Boundman drains Luffy of his haki, leaving him in need of a rest. Luckily, the colosseum combatants run interference while he recharges, and Sabo steps in at a crucial moment to defend his brother.
CAA32C42.title: Gatz

CC37D6C6.description: The Straw Hats happen across Zoro's former partners, Yosaku and Johnny, whose dietary dilemma reminds the pirates they still need a cook on their ship. Thus, they set sail for the sea restaurant Baratie, hoping to snag a chef.
CC37D6C6.title: Enter: Sanji

CC88315A.description: The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo, and the story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed.
CC88315A.title: Yeti Cool Brothers

CCCBEFC0.description: When Pudding arrives to meet the captured Luffy and Nami, their hopefulness suddenly turns to shock! To make matters worse, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself! At the risk of his own well-being, Luffy desperately tries to free himself.
CCCBEFC0.title: A Ray of Light

CD83F1E9.description: Law has a trick up his sleeve that turns the tide in the alliance’s favor, to include an on-the-spot partnership with former foes. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, and it is all Luffy’s group can do to ensure everyone’s safety in the lab.
CD83F1E9.title: The Counterattack Begins!

CE01A533.description: Following a near disaster in the Calm Belt, the Straw Hats take a wild ride up and down a mountain… and are promptly swallowed by a giant whale!
CE01A533.title: Reverse Mountain

CE6E899D.description: In the midst of the chaos on the Performance Floor, Chopper learns the secret behind Queen's latest plague. Meanwhile, Big Mom reaches the roof, Sanji hurries in the name of love, and Zoro watches as something falls from the hole in the ceiling.
CE6E899D.title: Flame Clouds

CEF78887.description: The Straw Hats’ new wanted posters begin circulating around the world, but three days earlier, Blackbeard began plotting their pursuit. However, one obstacle stood in his way; Ace had finally caught up to his estranged crewmate!
CEF78887.title: The Circling Bounties and The Duel on Banaro Island!

CF0B1E5A.description: The crew splits up into Nami's escape team and Luffy's exploration team. Unfortunately, a giant snake attacks and separates Luffy's team. To top it all off, the Priests have set up their ordeals across the whole island.
CF0B1E5A.title: Dial Battle

CF6F1505.description: Franky stages his own rebellious act against Spandam while Luffy's crew makes a daring leap of faith to hopefully gain entrance to the Tower of Justice.
CF6F1505.title: Jump into the Waterfall!!

CFA091A0.description: Luffy leads a daring—but foolish—raid on Crocodile’s casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker. But more importantly, these actions leave Vivi alone and unprotected.
CFA091A0.title: It Begins

D08B41AE.description: Kuro's ultimate move attacks everything in the area, friend nor foe notwithstanding, and Luffy becomes enraged by Kuro's lack of regard for his crew.
D08B41AE.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls

D0A51040.description: The island is saved without any villagers ever knowing what almost befell their home. Kaya, grateful to the Straw Hats for what they did, gifts them something invaluable for sailing the high seas. Meanwhile, one more person joins Luffy's crew.
D0A51040.title: To the Sea

D16C3A7A.description: The players have assembled at last! Whitebeard unleashes a tsunami that is set to swallow every marine and turn Marine HQ upside down. The fight has just begun, as Marine admirals and pirate commanders alike showcase their incredible abilities.
D16C3A7A.title: Conflict at the Summit

D1742A98.description: The island is saved without any villagers ever knowing what almost befell their home. Kaya, grateful to the Straw Hats for what they did, gifts them something invaluable for sailing the high seas. Meanwhile, one more person joins Luffy's crew.
D1742A98.title: To the Sea

D17BD2C5.description: Iceburg has been shot! When Luffy and Nami decide to go check on him, the fire-breathing, half-mechanical Franky challenges the Straw Hats’ captain. Before their fight gets too heated, Galley-La swoops in with an unexpected accusation!
D17BD2C5.title: Warning

D2E02F36.description: At the shogun’s banquet, the oiran’s child attendant Otoko bursts with laughter and cannot stop. The enraged Shogun Orochi attacks her, but an unexpected person stands in his way. To end the to-do, Kyoshiro takes matters into his own hands.
D2E02F36.title: The Shogun and the Oiran

D3899913.description: Zoro and the others dash out of Bakura Town on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them, and together, they distribute food and water to the people of Okobore Town. Later, Law takes them to the ruins of a hilltop castle.
D3899913.title: The Ruins of Oden Castle

D511F339.description: The three-way struggle between the Marines, the Blackbeard Pirates, and the Kuja Pirates comes to an end when an unexpected figure shows up. On the Sunny, the Straw Hats talk about the recent incidents around the world and Luffy’s words surprise everyone.
D511F339.title: The Matter Involving Captain Koby

D538CFD7.description: Sanji crashes Absalom's sham of a wedding, the fire in his heart burning brightly as he rescues Nami. A curious connection between Sanji and the Clear-Clear Fruit is revealed, and he vows to defeat Absalom for ruining his lifelong dream.
D538CFD7.title: A Stolen Dream! Sanji vs. Absalom

D56597BC.description: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, and the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed! Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
D56597BC.title: Luffy and Law's All-out Attack! The Takeover of the New Era!

D5D6D5BA.description: The Straw Hats raid the Franky House, but they soon find that their real target, Franky, is long gone with the stolen money. When the battered Usopp awakens, nothing can prepare him to hear what Luffy has decided about the Merry.
D5D6D5BA.title: Impasse

D7327225.description: Luffy meets a small dog guarding his late master’s store. Meanwhile, Beast Tamer Mohji, Cabaji the Acrobat, and the lion Richie show up in the streets of Orange Town to get revenge for Captain Buggy's humiliating loss.
D7327225.title: Treasure

D78E29CD.description: Yamato notices something in Luffy that reminds him of someone from long ago. When Orochi declares he will execute Momonosuke, Kaido adds to the excitement with a big announcement, and at the rear of the mansion, the Red Scabbards reunite!
D78E29CD.title: My Bible

D85BC22C.description: Although Marine HQ is in ruins after the Summit War, Marines and reporters still stalk its grounds. Luffy, Rayleigh, and Jinbe return to where Ace died to carry out a mysterious plan. If all goes well, Luffy’s crew will understand his actions.
D85BC22C.title: NEWS

D8C1FD62.description: As the dust of battle settles, the still poisoned Gin decides to go back to the Grand Line with Krieg, and Sanji makes the difficult decision to join Luffy's crew. Suddenly, Yosaku returns with news of where Nami took the Going Merry.
D8C1FD62.title: The Fourth

D8E8370A.description: A voice from the past unsettles Luffy and sends him into a rage! Also, it's discovered that Rebecca's eternal bond with the one-legged toy soldier is linked to the violent overthrow of the old regime, perpetrated by none other than Doflamingo!
D8E8370A.title: A Sad Past! Rebecca and Soldier-san

D985734A.description: Friend and foe alike fall victim to Queen's chilling virus, and Apoo is playing keep-away with the vial of antibodies. Perospero and Marco's brief alliance is shattered, and so are Nami and Usopp's skulls as they face down Ulti and Page One.
D985734A.title: A Kunoichi's Oath

D9CD96CA.description: In the aftermath of Luffy's epic battle with Enel, sunny skies chase away the storms, and the cloud-dwelling citizens of Angel Island turn their attention to rebuilding their homeland.
D9CD96CA.title: Fantasia

D9EEB564.description: Pedro creates a diversion for Brook to put his soulful plan into action. Meanwhile, the captured Luffy continues to goad Big Mom, and Pudding has the beginnings of rebellion stirring up inside her.
D9EEB564.title: Luffy and Big Mom

DA166192.description: The Straw Hats split up to find the correct key before Robin’s fate is sealed. Zoro finds and engages Kaku in battle, and Sogeking attempts to steal a key from the sleeping Jabra.
DA166192.title: Pirates vs. CP9

DA5B5D04.description: The pirates receive an unexpected invitation to Ryugu Palace from Neptune himself, king of Fishman Island. Tempted by the smell of food, Luffy wanders the palace and soon finds an enormous tower with a sturdy yet battle-worn door.
DA5B5D04.title: The King of Fishman Island Invited to Ryugu Palace!

DB23E2E6.description: Nojiko goes into detail about Nami's childhood and their adoptive mother Bell-mère, a former Marine. Despite being poor and unrelated by blood, they had a happy life on their tangerine orchard.
DB23E2E6.title: Bell-mère

DBA50B89.description: Hody’s plan for revenge is set in motion, and the Straw Hats who have unwittingly taken control of the palace must now defend it against the New Fishman Pirates. Outside, Luffy’s excursion with Shirahoshi is rudely interrupted.
DBA50B89.title: The Beginning of the Vengeful Plan! Zoro vs. Hody!

DC6C3C54.description: Heavy hitters from the colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks toward a unified plan, which might be just enough to give Luffy the chance he needs to make it to a final showdown with Doflamingo.
DC6C3C54.title: Battle

DCF7AD65.description: Perona prepares to leave Gloom Island after she finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is still alive. Meanwhile, Moria raids the infamous Pirate Island with his zombie army to retrieve his old friend from Blackbeard.
DCF7AD65.title: Void

DD135B35.description: Usopp, immensely impressed with the giants of Elbaph, names Brogy his master. To commemorate their duel, the giants imbibe two barrels of booze from Nami, but, unbeknownst to anyone, a saboteur has tampered with one of them!
DD135B35.title: Dorry and Brogy

DECF4267.description: Twenty years ago, Nico Robin grew up on Ohara in the West Blue, striving to become an archaeologist like her mother. When Robin met Saul, a giant who washed onto the shores of Ohara, her life would forever be changed.
DECF4267.title: The Girl They Called a Devil

DF3A7006.description: The Straw Hats have reassembled at last, an army of New Fishman Pirates standing before them. With the last two years still fresh in their minds, the Straw Hats’ training is put to the test, and they unleash a flurry of new techniques.
DF3A7006.title: 100,000 vs. 10! The Straw Hats' Explosive Moves

DFB30A71.description: Luffy and Zoro are outed by Scratchman Apoo, and Queen announces that anyone who catches them will get a coveted promotion. Elsewhere, Kin’emon's infiltration strategy evolves while Big Mom's children are greeted by a surprise party crasher.
DFB30A71.title: Fighting Music

E004EDB5.description: Yamato continues to pursue Momonosuke as Shinobu scurries with him through the halls of Onigashima. Meanwhile, the battle on the roof intensifies as the Scabbards fight with honor to prove they are not just cheap imitations of the great Kozuki Oden.
E004EDB5.title: Remnants

E058DEF9.description: Zoro and co. strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji gets distracted by the alluring dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosan. Meanwhile, the prize of the late Ace’s devil fruit draws Luffy and Franky to the colosseum.
E058DEF9.title: Corrida Colosseum! The Great Tournament

E123D314.description: Sanji’s tragic history included a rare moment of compassion that was his only chance at escape, but even then, his father’s cruelty haunted him. In the present, Reiju helps Sanji straighten himself out before he meets with his fiancée.
E123D314.title: To the East Blue

E3AB2BA0.description: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi heads for Onigashima where a big banquet is being held, and the Red Scabbards meet at the Tokage Port rendezvous point. However, Kin'emon and his compatriots are stunned that none of their allies are there.
E3AB2BA0.title: The Designated Port

E3C90B8B.description: The losers of the colosseum who are being held below the infirmary have an unexpected addition to their numbers. Meanwhile, the history of Tontatta is made clear, as is the shocking identity of the toy soldier!
E3C90B8B.title: The Plight of the Riku Clan! The Lurking Hero Awaits in the Shadows!

E468A31D.description: Cricket explains how the Straw Hats can ride a dangerous vertical sea current to get to Skypiea. However, they must first catch a south bird to steer them toward the point where the stream will erupt from the ocean.
E468A31D.title: Let's Eat

E46F5F07.description: Facing Kuma on the battlefield, Ivankov reveals their shared past, but his pleas to his old companion fall on deaf ears as Kuma continues his attacks. In a sea of confusion, only Doflamingo seems to know the truth.
E46F5F07.title: The Prisoners of Impel Down

E4B077F8.description: Luffy and co. ride out the rain-ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou. As they continue toward the fortress, they learn more about the mysterious minks, and are finally reunited with the others.
E4B077F8.title: At Rightflank Fortress

E4BA97D6.description: The Merry makes landfall at Arabasta’s port town, and while the rest of the Straw Hats wisely don disguises, Luffy runs afoul of an old foe. However, a chance reunion with a flame-wielding member of Luffy’s family might just be the saving grace he needs!
E4BA97D6.title: Landfall in Alabasta

E4F68497.description: Vivi finds the cannon but realizes the bomb can't be stopped so casually. Then Pell swoops in with a decisive, if tragic, solution. The final battle between Luffy and Crocodile, which has both parties driven to their utmost, reaches its conclusion.
E4F68497.title: I Will Defeat You

E5F09F49.description: Influenced by the straw-hat-wearing pirate Red-Haired Shanks, an enthusiastic young boy named Monkey D. Luffy dreams of one day becoming King of the Pirates.
E5F09F49.title: Romance Dawn, the Dawn of an Adventure

E7044DBE.description: Chopper began life as an ordinary reindeer but was shunned by his own kind because of his unusual blue nose. Even after eating the Human-Human Devil Fruit, the islanders wanted nothing to do with him. That is, until Chopper met a certain quack doctor.
E7044DBE.title: Quack Doctor

E70913D9.description: The mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. When the haze clears, what greets the Straw Hats is beyond anyone’s expectations! Luffy and co. find the Sunny nearby, but the rest of the crew has already disembarked.
E70913D9.title: Zou

E75794DB.description: Buggy, after being defeated by Luffy, Zoro, and Nami, begins his quest to regain his body parts and his crew, and then he will get his flashy revenge on Luffy.
E75794DB.title: The Adventures of Buggy's Crew

E7B15590.description: The Summit War has thrown the entire world into chaos. Emboldened by Whitebeard's final words, pirates once again envision a wave they can ride into a new era. At Hancock’s order, Luffy is taken to Amazon Lily to hide from the Marines while he recovers.
E7B15590.title: Creeping Future

E817809A.description: Luffy storms the village of women in hopes of acquiring a boat. However, a misstep lands him in the personal bath of none other than the Snake Princess. As he peers through the steam rising from its waters, he sees a forbidden secret etched upon her back.
E817809A.title: Pirate Empress Boa Hancock

E9317CBD.description: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain. Now, the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! With the help of Germa and the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape!
E9317CBD.title: BAD END MUSICAL

E98F852E.description: A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to try and kill Corazón! Law was accepted into the Doflamingo Family, but Corazón's mysterious silence hid a fact that just may have saved Law's life.
E98F852E.title: White Town

E98FA912.description: When Block A concludes, the crowds are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner. Block B commences, and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring, but he will have to contend with Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy!
E98FA912.title: Bellamy's Changed Motivations and B Block's Start!

E9E8604E.description: At Rain Dinners, the Baroque Works officer agents are finally let on to Mr. 0's true identity. And just outside Yuba, Luffy confronts a stubborn Vivi to remind her who else is willing to stand with her.
E9E8604E.title: I Love My Country

EA100F0C.description: Brook bids the Straw Hats farewell, and they decide to explore the nearby ghost island Thriller Bark. Freakish danger awaits the landing party the moment they arrive, and, back on the Sunny, the rest of the crew is harassed by an unseen foe.
EA100F0C.title: Adventure on the Ghost Island and the Famous Doctor Hogback!

EAA06203.description: The Straw Hats have evaded the Marines, but a new development crops up when a certain stowaway makes her presence on the Going Merry known… and she wants to be part of the crew!
EAA06203.title: Stowaway

EACE397D.description: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Sanji gets in touch with Law to share a shocking secret that could unsettle all their plans in Dressrosa.
EACE397D.title: Doflamingo Arrives! The Ultimate Schemer!

EB0BC95C.description: Franky’s mechanical masterpieces have transformations in store that can only be described as "super!" However, onlookers curb their enthusiasm when a foreboding shadow is cast upon the plaza by a giant ship hurtling toward the island!
EB0BC95C.title: The General from the Future Land and the Crisis of Fishman Island's Destruction

EB4DA5F4.description: The Straw Hats learn that the head honcho on the island is one of the Seven Warlords, and he has concocted a shadowy scheme. As Absalom rallies the zombies, the master of Thriller Bark awakens.
EB4DA5F4.title: General Zombie Night! Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four

EB6E8FF5.description: After bidding farewell to Gan Fall and passing through the gate to Skypiea, the pirates encounter a family of Skypieans: Conis and her father, Pagaya. The two explain the workings of life in the sky and introduce the crew to the different dials.
EB6E8FF5.title: Angel Beach

EBBD7693.description: Luffy launches a one-man assault on Enies Lobby, and the rest of his allies work to break the first gate's defenses. What awaits Galley-La and the Franky Family at the second gate is a showdown of massive proportions!
EBBD7693.title: The Big Showdown on the Judiciary Island!!

ECD80B22.description: The Tontattas finish demolishing the SMILE Factory and taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, the birdcage draws ever tighter around Dressrosa.
ECD80B22.title: The Curse of Heart

EF1D7B5F.description: While the Straw Hats continue to wear away at Oars, Nami confronts Perona attempting to escape on board the Thousand Sunny, but the sudden appearance of a large, mysterious figure soon makes her efforts moot.
EF1D7B5F.title: The Mysterious Visitor! The Two Warlords Meet!

EF447336.description: While Koby desperately attempts to flee Beehive, Cross Guild's bounty entices the hundreds of pirates there to hunt him down. But before they can seal his fate and claim the prize, a familiar Marine warship descends from the sky!
EF447336.title: The Legendary Hero

F0334710.description: The Straw Hats arrive at Duval's (eerily quiet) base and manage to locate Camie's captured friend. Realizing the captive’s identity, the Straw Hats reluctantly agree to rescue him, and only in exchange for directions to Fishman Island.
F0334710.title: Iron Mask Duval

F0B1F815.description: Luffy agrees to an unexpected alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master of the island unleashes something extremely deadly!
F0B1F815.title: Pirate Alliance

F0C33425.description: It is utter chaos in Impel Down, and between the sudden appearance of Blackbeard, the vice warden’s interference, and Magellan’s dogged attempts to restore order, the escape team just might see daylight yet!
F0C33425.title: To Sunshine and Freedom

F0EF6382.description: Luffy's fight with Wyper lands him in a dark cavern filled with ruins, Enel leaves a deadly pair of new enemies to deal with Nami and Gan Fall, and Chopper comes face to face with Sky Punk Gedatsu.
F0EF6382.title: Pirate Chopper vs. Priest Gedatsu

F0FBC907.description: Sanji and Franky conclude their fights and enter the train car where CP9’s agents lie in wait. When Sogeking sees the danger of the situation, it falls to him to formulate a plan for escape. However, CP9 is far from being thwarted!
F0FBC907.title: Necessary Evil

F134C10A.description: The sudden appearance of a Celestial Dragon almost imperiled Fishman Island, but Queen Otohime’s ability to end hostilities provided a ray of hope for everyone. Just when the path to the future seemed bright, a shot echoed through the plaza.
F134C10A.title: The Shipwrecked Celestial Dragon! A Bullet That Seals the Future

F15AFDE0.description: Luffy and the others see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie right as they approach Wano. However, this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious, with the sea itself acting as a barrier!
F15AFDE0.title: Onward to Wano

F1FB27C6.description: The raid on Onigashima kicks off with Law's group sneaking around the back and Luffy's group moving straight through the front door, cleverly disguised as the enemy itself! Meanwhile, Kaido holds an audience with the Soaring Six.
F1FB27C6.title: A Family Matter

F20B5423.description: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage and vicious contenders set their sights on her. Meanwhile, Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand.
F20B5423.title: D Block's Fiery Start and the Heavenly Demon's Revelation!

F218F0E4.description: Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns within him to pay back the favor he owes! Lao G and Don Chinjao bring their most devastating attacks to bear, but a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted.
F218F0E4.title: The Spear of Elbaph and Don Sai

F23079ED.description: At death's door, the Rumbar Pirates sang "Binks' Brew" one last time and recorded it in a tone dial, hoping to one day deliver it to Laboon. With their new crewmate and musician Brook on board, the Straw Hats bid farewell to Lola’s crew.
F23079ED.title: Brook's Promise! The Eighth Member

F2D99494.description: While the fight between Luffy and Kuro continues, Jango works to force Kaya to bequeath her family's money to the Black Cat captain. Despite the Usopp Pirates' efforts to stop the hypnotist, it seems as if the transaction is all but inevitable.
F2D99494.title: The Pirate "Kuro of a Hundred Plans"

F3E829E8.description: Babanuki unleashes an unthinkable weapon, and a mysterious figure emerges from a forbidden cell to save Luffy. Then, Old Man Hyo emboldens Raizo and Kiku to reveal their true identities and give the desperate prisoners some much-needed hope.
F3E829E8.title: Mummy

F47C3EDD.description: The stage is set, the curtain is drawn, and the Red Scabbards approach their target of 20 years. Luffy and Yamato burst onto the Performance Floor with a bang, and Wano's samurai make the opening attack for the long-anticipated battle.
F47C3EDD.title: Retainers of Glory

F4BB17EB.description: Queen Otohime tried to lead the Ryugu Kingdom into an era of coexistence between humans and fishmen. At the same time, the heroic Fisher Tiger battled humans to free their slaves from captivity.
F4BB17EB.title: Otohime, Fisher Tiger, and the Sun Pirates! The Fateful Encounter!

F6C7EB83.description: The resolution that passed during the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, Captain Koby secretly contacts someone currently in Wano.
F6C7EB83.title: Big News

F71F9B71.description: Luffy and co. finally find Otama hanging from the mouth of a lion in Holdem’s stomach. Luffy prepares to save Otama from Kaido’s lackey, and elsewhere, a mysterious figure confronts Basil Hawkins.
F71F9B71.title: The Provisions Ship

F7CB97CD.description: The Caesar Transfer Team is on approach to Green Bit, but the colossal coastal fish of Dressrosa are biting, and the connecting bridge has collapsed! The team gathers their wits to make it across, but they soon discover they are not alone on the island.
F7CB97CD.title: To Green Bit! The Adventure in the Land of Dwarves!

F850EAFD.description: The struggle with Krieg nears its end. Luffy's fighting spirit is unwavering, even after taking several hits from Krieg's Stalwart War Spear. Straw Hat’s strategy shifts to smashing through Krieg’s defenses and attacking the spear head-on.
F850EAFD.title: The Stalwart War Spear

F96F0A4A.description: Robin and her tall, mysterious, masked companion arrive at Iceburg's room, and she learns that he possesses blueprints to the ancient weapon Pluton, spoken of in the poneglyphs. Then, shockingly, the members of CP9 unmask themselves.
F96F0A4A.title: Cipher Pol No. 9

F9DE972C.description: Kuro's ultimate move attacks everything in the area, friend nor foe notwithstanding, and Luffy becomes enraged by Kuro's lack of regard for his crew.
F9DE972C.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls

F9F0F488.description: Luffy and the others see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie right as they approach Wano. However, this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious, with the sea itself acting as a barrier!
F9F0F488.title: Onward to Wano

FA2E5ADD.description: Luffy returns victorious from his showdown with Bellamy, and the Going Merry has been refit by the Saruyama Alliance to handle its upcoming upward flight. The Straw Hats follow their captive south bird and steel themselves for their journey to the sky.
FA2E5ADD.title: The Knock-Up Stream

FA5B3DCD.description: Luffy and Ace buried their sorrow and grew stronger day by day as they trained to be pirates. Time marched on, and they eventually bade farewell to their childhood home and took to the sea, hoping to achieve the dream that Sabo could not.
FA5B3DCD.title: Will of the Winds

FA63AC14.description: The Straw Hats arrive at their destination and discover that the island is home to enormous creatures... and people. Meanwhile, the Baroque Works agents Mr. 3 and his partner Miss Golden Week receive new orders.
FA63AC14.title: Adventure on Little Garden

FB406E73.description: Luffy and his dubious companions face off against the mythical beasts of Level 2. Impel Down is put on lockdown, its only exit sealed, but Luffy, unaware and unafraid, continues to Ace's floor, only to have another unexpected reunion.
FB406E73.title: From One Hell to Another

FBA08093.description: Encased in a protective bubble, the Sunny departs for Fishman Island far under the sea. As the Straw Hats marvel at the sights, Franky tells the crew about their greatest ally in their time apart. But suddenly, a mysterious shadow closes in on the ship.
FBA08093.title: Into the Depths! The Kraken and the Caribou Pirates

FBEA8001.description: As the citizens of the sky run for their lives, Enel activates Deathpiea! Luffy must discover a way to lay hands on the heinous holy man before he's sent overboard, and Sanji and Usopp mount a midair rescue mission.
FBEA8001.title: Deathpiea

FC2376A1.description: The mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his identity, but this must all be put aside when one of Big Mom's most powerful commanders comes calling. Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping the baddies at bay.
FC2376A1.title: Lola's Vivre Card

FCF3D074.description: Luffy is on hiatus from pirating to work as a cabin boy to pay off the damage done to the Baratie. While he tries to convince Sanji to join his crew, the pirate Gin brings the infamous Don Krieg and his starving forces to the sea restaurant.
FCF3D074.title: Pirate Commodore Don Krieg

FCF7F7E4.description: Jinbe reunites with Luffy in the undersea forest and reveals a shocking connection to an old foe. The former Warlord begins a tale of when two famous figures fought to undo the animosity that existed between humans and fishmen.
FCF7F7E4.title: At the Sea Forest! Arlong and Hody

FD2B4F32.description: En route to Arabasta, Nami falls ill. Without a doctor aboard the Going Merry, the Straw Hats must decide whether to stay the course or find more immediate help. As their ship crosses into a frigid area, a figure is seen standing on the water's surface.
FD2B4F32.title: Tin Plate Wapol

FE0F64E2.description: Sanji faces his greatest weakness: fighting a beautiful woman! Meanwhile, Franky begins to run low on cola energy, but he must battle the peculiar Fukuro to obtain more of his refreshing fuel from the kitchen.
FE0F64E2.title: Mr. Chivalry

FE661F6E.description: Luffy’s group finds themselves up against a gang of centaurs, Brook battles an aggressive mysterious torso, and Vice Admiral Smoker encounters someone highly unexpected! Meanwhile, Nami and Chopper seek a safe exit for a group of children.
FE661F6E.title: About My Torso

FE878EE8.description: Momonosuke is finally freed, and King and Queen must contend with the incursion of samurai and pirates on the Performance Floor. Big Mom is swiftly removed from the situation, and the Straw Hat pirates gather once more as the assualt kicks off!
FE878EE8.title: I Can't Imagine Losing

FEA121C3.description: Aboard the Little Crow, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji enter Upper Yard and must choose an ordeal. Meanwhile, Zoro and co. have their own troubles at the Sacrificial Altar. When they leave to explore the forest, Chopper is left to repair the Merry.
FEA121C3.title: Adventure on God's Island

FF1E1708.description: Vivi and co. finally reach Yuba, the last known location of the Rebel Army, but there is nary a soul in sight. Meanwhile, at the behest of their hidden leader, Baroque Works' officer agents begin to gather at the Spiders Cafe.
FF1E1708.title: Yuba, the Town of Rebels

FF26917C.description: Usopp and Chopper combine their skills to finish off Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, and Sanji engages Mr. 2 in a vicious foot-to-foot struggle. Meanwhile, as a last-ditch effort to save her people, Princess Vivi gives Chaka an unprecedented order.
FF26917C.title: Okama Kenpo

0.description: Occasionally, the One Pace team likes to have some extra fun, so we made animated specials. See alternative storylines with twists you might not have expected.
0.title: Specials

1.description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out on an adventure to form a crew, find the legendary One Piece, and become the pirate king.
1.title: Romance Dawn

10.description: The first island on the Grand Line is surprisingly welcoming to pirates. But as night falls, a deadly plot unravels.
10.title: Whisky Peak

11.description: Koby and Helmeppo are new cabin boys for the marines, but they become unwillingly involved in an escape attempt by Morgan. Their bravery will either earn them the respect of their superiors—as well as Vice Admiral Garp—or it will spell their doom.
11.title: The Trials of Koby-Meppo

12.description: The Straw Hats vow to bring Princess Vivi to Arabasta, and their journey brings them to Little Garden, an island from prehistoria that is home to creatures and people larger than life.
12.title: Little Garden

13.description: When Nami falls ill, the crew makes a detour from Arabasta to seek medical help. They happen upon a winter island inhabited by a distrusting populace and a single doctor with a mysterious reindeer companion.
13.title: Drum Island

14.description: Arabasta teeters on the edge of civil war, and it's up to Princess Vivi and the Straw Hats to stem the rebellion, uncover the plot of Baroque Works, and beat the Warlord Crocodile.
14.title: Arabasta

15.description: The Straw Hats seek the fabled sky island Skypiea and head to Jaya for information on its whereabouts. Their convictions are tested by the pirates of Mock Town, but not everyone on the island is a hardline skeptic.
15.title: Jaya

16.description: Arriving at Skypiea, the Straw Hats are instantly met with unfamiliar sights, objects, and customs. What's more, the god of the sky island deems the Blue Sea dwellers to be trespassing and casts his judgment upon them.
16.title: Skypiea

17.description: On Long Ring Long Land, the Straw Hats are challenged to a Davy Back Fight. As they dive headfirst into a series of games with serious outcomes, the best the Navy has to offer has meanwhile begun to pay closer attention to certain Straw Hat crewmembers.
17.title: Long Ring Long Land

18.description: The Straw Hats make landfall at the glorious city of Water Seven, known worldwide for its unparalleled shipyards. The pirates go to inquire about repairs for their ship, but the city threatens to take their money, their ship, and their crewmates.
18.title: Water Seven

19.description: In order to free Nico Robin from the clutches of the World Government, the Straw Hats and their allies must invade the judicial island, Enies Lobby, and take on the government's premiere clandestine unit: CP9.
19.title: Enies Lobby

2.description: Luffy and Zoro run afoul of a flashy crew of pirates and their captain, Buggy the Clown. They are joined by a young girl named Nami who helps them navigate this predicament.
2.title: Orange Town

20.description: The Straw Hats return to Water Seven after the ordeal at Enies Lobby. While there, they are met by a familial vice admiral, and they await news of their new ship.
20.title: Post-Enies Lobby

21.description: The Straw Hats' next destination is Fishman Island, but first they must traverse the dreaded Florian Triangle which is known for many eerie and mysterious things such as disappearing crews, conversational skeletons, and a floating island full of zombies and other horrors.
21.title: Thriller Bark

22.description: The second half of the Grand Line lays just ahead, so the Straw Hats stop at Sabaody Archipelago to plan the way forward. But being so close to the Holy Land and Navy Headquarters, Luffy's crew comes face-to-face with the darkest forces of the World Government.
22.title: Sabaody Archipelago

23.description: Luffy is separated from his crew, and he finds himself on an unfamiliar island in the middle of the Calm Belt... an island inhabited only by women where men are prohibited from entering.
23.title: Amazon Lily

24.description: Luffy launches a daring rescue mission to break his big brother Ace from the government prison, Impel Down. It's a race to the prison's lowest levels — a literal journey through hell itself.
24.title: Impel Down

25.description: Somewhere in the world... Sanji resists, while Robin meets terrible people. Franky's not himself, and Usopp learns to survive. Chopper avoids becoming food, and Nami reports on the weather. Brook is repaid in underpants, and Zoro... is lost and annoyed.
25.title: The Adventures of the Straw Hats

26.description: Pirate Whitebeard and his allies on one side; the Navy and its Seven Warlords on the other. At the center of it all: Portgas D. Ace and his unspeakable past and heritage. Luffy races to Ace's execution scaffold as a battle between the world's most powerful people unfolds.
26.title: Marineford

27.description: The war has taken its toll on the world, and Luffy reminisces about younger days when he first met Ace and became his brother. To become strong enough to withstand the New World, Luffy must make a critical decision for himself and his crew.
27.title: Post-War

28.description: Two years have passed since the Straw Hats were forcibly separated, and they reconvene back at Sabaody stronger and even more committed to the journey ahead.
28.title: Return to Sabaody

29.description: The path the to the New World takes the Straw Hats thousands of leagues under the sea to the underwater Fishman Island. However, the island's dark past is reaching a breaking point, and Luffy and his crew are caught in the middle of the conflict.
29.title: Fishman Island

3.description: Luffy's fledgling pirate crew arrives at the slopes of Syrup Village. There they find a liar and a conspiracy to steal a young lady's fortune.
3.title: Syrup Village

30.description: The first island of the New World is a strange place covered in flames on one half, and freezing temperatures on the other. What seems at first to be an unlivable place later reveals a laboratory, a maniac scientist, and a certain Warlord of the Sea.
30.title: Punk Hazard

31.description: Luffy's alliance with Law brings him next to Dressrosa to take down Doflamingo's booming business. But the crazed warlord and self-proclaimed ruler of Dressrosa has control over everyone and everything.
31.title: Dressrosa

32.description: Zou cannot be reached by conventional means, nor is it easy to enter once one finds it. Within its secretive walls lie the Mink Tribe, and the Straw Hats soon discover that the people of Zou hold a piece of the puzzle that unlocks the mysteries of the world.
32.title: Zou

33.description: Luffy will not sail the seas without his cook, so he stubbornly goes after Sanji to Whole Cake Island. However, knocking on an emperor's door is easier said than done.
33.title: Whole Cake Island

34.description: Every four years, the leaders of the world gather at the Holy Land to discuss a mutually agreed upon path for the government. During this particular Reverie, many parties with their own agendas arrive... and some are uninvited.
34.title: Reverie

35.description: The Straw Hats finally regroup in Wano to carry out theirs and their allies' ultimate goal: to see to the Emperor Kaido's downfall and restore the Kozuki family to its rightful place of power.
35.title: Wano

36.description: Futuristic tech, giant alien monsters, battle robots, superhuman clones... Who are all these people calling themselves Dr. Vegapunk, and why is the government after one of their own?
36.title: Egghead

4.description: With Usopp now on the crew and their new ship, the Going Merry, under their command, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure. There they encounter a strange man stuck in a box who has been looking for the same treasure.
4.title: Gaimon

5.description: The Straw Hats head to the ocean-going restaurant, Baratie, with the hopes of recruiting one of their cooks. In the meantime, hungry yet powerful forces gather to lay siege to the restaurant — all while a menacing swordsman from the Grand Line steadily approaches.
5.title: Baratie

6.description: Nami's hometown has long been overrun by Arlong and his band of fishmen from the Grand Line. When the Straw Hats arrive, they find that their prospective navigator has left out a few key details about herself.
6.title: Arlong Park

7.description: Buggy, after being defeated by Luffy, Zoro, and Nami, begins his quest to regain his body parts and his crew, and then he will get his flashy revenge on Luffy.
7.title: The Adventures of Buggy's Crew

8.description: The final island before entering the Grand Line: Loguetown. Luffy and his crew drop anchor to stock up, sightsee, and pay their respects to the place where Gold Roger drew his last breath.
8.title: Loguetown

9.description: Reverse Mountain is the entrance to the Grand Line. What await the Straw Hats are impossible water currents, a giant whale, and dubious people going by codenames.
9.title: Reverse Mountain

98.description: As the Straw Hat Pirates reunite on the Sabaody Archipelago, the various members of the island are drawn together like pieces of a puzzle, their love of certain members of the crew driving their actions and emotions.
98.title: One Piece Fan Letter

tvshow.plot: One Pace is a fan project that recuts the One Piece anime in an endeavor to  bring it more in line with the pacing of the original manga by Eiichiro Oda.  The team accomplishes this by removing filler scenes not present in the source material.
tvshow.title: One Pace
